siyat shri lanka tayar samagame wikunum ha alewi samanyadhikari rawi dadilani mahatha wisin shuddha wu pawule kanyaramaye widuhalpathini chandani jayasuriya kanya sohoyuriyata marga sangnya puwaru pradanaya kala awasthawa.siyat shri lanka tayar samagame samaja sathkaraka wagakim wadasatahanak lesa pasal sisu sisuwiyange marga surakshitha bawa wadi diyunu kirimata katayuthu yoda atha.samagame siyaluma aayathanika samajiya wagakim wadasatahan ehi aayathanika kalamanakarana prathipaththi malawa ha eekabaddhawa sidu kirimata salasum kara athi bawath, siyat samagama wisin pradhana samaja sathkaraka kriya lesa prathamika adhyapanaya wadidiyunu kirima ha pasal lamayi sandaha marga surakshitha bawa wadidiyunu kirima yana ansha handunagena athi bawa siyat shri lanka kalamanakara adhyakshaka randip naran mahatha pawasuweya.maginge saha padikayange aarakshawa sandaha wahanawalata yoda athi tayarwala thaththwaya da balapanawa.
